channel.title: Healthcare on The Approximate Mind
channel.description: Recent content in Healthcare on The Approximate Mind

item.title: The Approximate Mind, Part 13: The Weight of Seeing Ahead
item.description: The oracle at Delphi spoke in riddles. Cassandra knew the future but no one believed her. Tiresias paid for foresight with blindness. Every culture has stories about the burden of knowing what comes next.
